動物用藥品名稱: 馬爾他新城病、傳染性鼻炎不活化混合疫苗
效能(適應症): 預防種雞及蛋雞感染新城病及傳染性鼻炎。
ingredients: INACTIVATED NEWCASTLE DISEASE VIRUS:10^9EID50 BEFORE INACTIVATION.INACTIVATED CULTURES OF:HAEMOPHILUS PARAGALLINARUM SEROTYPE A 5X10^9CFU;HAEMOPHILUS PARAGALLINARUM SEROTYPE B 5X10^9CFU;HAEMOPHILUS PARAGALLINARUM SEROTYPE C 5X10^9CFU;SORBITAN MONOOLEATE 0.037ML-LIGHT MINERAL OIL 0.337ML-THIMERSAL 50UG.
